original_title: עלייתו ונפילתו של שם טוב האבי
overview: In order to sing trap and become a star you won't need a talent - just good gums and some anesthesia.  Watch the rise and fall of "Shem Tov Heavy" - Tamir Bar, Ravid Plotnik, Swissa, Jimbo Jay, Shekel, Lukach and others from the Israeli Hip-Hop scene unite to tell the story of Adam Shem Tov, the man who dreamt to become a trap-star and found himself behind bars.
title: The Rise And Fall Of Shem Tov Heavy
